verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, in the second <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after they were come out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H5375><s%> ye the sum <S%H7218><s%> of all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, every male <S%H2145><s%>, by their polls <S%H1538><s%>;

from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that are able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>, thou and Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall number <S%H6485><s%> them by their hosts <S%H6635><s%>.
And with you there shall be a man <S%H376><s%> of every <S%H376><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%>; every one <S%H376><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%>' house <S%H1004><s%>.
And these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> that shall stand <S%H5975><s%> with you <S%H7205><s%>. Of Reuben: Elizur <S%H468><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shedeur <S%H7707><s%>.
Of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>: Shelumiel <S%H8017><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zurishaddai <S%H6701><s%>.
Of Judah <S%H3063><s%>: Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab <S%H5992><s%>.
Of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>: Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar <S%H6686><s%>.
Of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>: Eliab <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Helon <S%H2497><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>: Of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>: Elishama <S%H476><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud <S%H5989><s%>. Of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>: Gamaliel <S%H1583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedahzur <S%H6301><s%>.
Of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>: Abidan <S%H27><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gideoni <S%H1441><s%>.
Of Dan <S%H1835><s%>: Ahiezer <S%H295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammishaddai <S%H5996><s%>.
Of Asher <S%H836><s%>: Pagiel <S%H6295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ochran <S%H5918><s%>.
Of Gad <S%H1410><s%>: Eliasaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Deuel <S%H1845><s%>.
Of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>: Ahira <S%H299><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Enan <S%H5881><s%>.

These are they that were <S%H7148><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>; they were the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of <S%H1992><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> these men <S%H582><s%> that are mentioned <S%H5344><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%>:

And they assembled <S%H6950><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> together <S%H6950><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>; and they declared their pedigrees <S%H3205><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, by their polls <S%H1538><s%>.
As Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so he numbered <S%H6485><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, Israel <S%H3478><s%>'s first-born <S%H1060><s%>, their generations <S%H8435><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, by their polls <S%H1538><s%>, every male <S%H2145><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4294><s%>, of the tribe of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, were forty <S%H705><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, their generations <S%H8435><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> thereof <S%H4557><s%>, according to the number of the names <S%H8034><s%>, by their polls <S%H1538><s%>, every male <S%H2145><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4294><s%>, of the tribe of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, their generations <S%H8435><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4294><s%>, of the tribe of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, were forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, their generations <S%H8435><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4294><s%>, of the tribe of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, were threescore <S%H7657><s%> and fourteen <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, their generations <S%H8435><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4294><s%>, of the tribe of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, their generations <S%H8435><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4294><s%>, of the tribe of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, namely <S%H1121><s%>, of the children of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, their generations <S%H8435><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;
those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4294><s%>, of the tribe of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, were forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, their generations <S%H8435><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4294><s%>, of the tribe of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, were thirty <S%H7970><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, their generations <S%H8435><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4294><s%>, of the tribe of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, were thirty <S%H7970><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>, their generations <S%H8435><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4294><s%>, of the tribe of Dan <S%H1835><s%>, were threescore <S%H8346><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>, their generations <S%H8435><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4294><s%>, of the tribe of Asher <S%H836><s%>, were forty <S%H705><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, their generations <S%H8435><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names <S%H8034><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%>;

those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them <S%H4294><s%>, of the tribe of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

These are they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%>, whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%>, and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, being twelve <S%H6240><s%> men <S%H376><s%>: they were each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H259><s%> for his fathers <S%H1><s%>' house <S%H1004><s%>.

So all they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, all that were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

even all they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> were six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>.
But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> after the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> were not numbered <S%H6485><s%> among them <S%H8432><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Only the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> thou shalt not number <S%H6485><s%>, neither shalt thou take <S%H5375><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of them among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

but appoint <S%H6485><s%> thou the Levites <S%H3881><s%> over the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, and over all the furniture <S%H3627><s%> thereof <S%H5375><s%>, and over all that belongeth to it: they shall bear the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and all the furniture <S%H3627><s%> thereof <S%H8334><s%>; and they shall minister unto it <S%H2583><s%>, and shall encamp round about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And when the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> setteth forward <S%H5265><s%>, the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall take it down <S%H3381><s%>; and when the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> is to be pitched <S%H2583><s%>, the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall set it up <S%H6965><s%>: and the stranger <S%H2114><s%> that cometh nigh <S%H7131><s%> shall be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall pitch their tents <S%H2583><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> by his own camp <S%H4264><s%>, and every man <S%H376><s%> by his own standard <S%H1714><s%>, according to their hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall encamp <S%H2583><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, that there be no wrath <S%H7110><s%> upon the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>.
Thus did <S%H6213><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; according to all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so did they <S%H6213><s%>.
